thread.title: Numerous races will affect Louisiana education policy
thread.title_full: Numerous races will affect Louisiana education policy - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Numerous races will affect Louisiana education policy
text: NEW ORLEANS (AP) - When it comes to the future of public school policy in Louisiana, the political math gets complicated and party lines blur. The new governor will appoint three members of the 11-member state Board of Elementary and Secondary Education. Eight other BESE members are being elected from ... ...
